meanings.definition: To surpass in design or creativity.
meanings.sent1: She outdesigns her classmates with her unique ideas.
meanings.sent2: The new architect outdesigns the competition with innovative blueprints.
meanings.sent3: The young artist outdesigns everyone in the art class, surprising them all.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity outdesigns the boundaries of conventional art.
meanings.sent5: His ability to outdesigns others makes him stand out in the industry.

meanings.definition: To create a design that is superior to others.
meanings.sent1: The fashion designer outdesigns her previous collection with stunning new pieces.
meanings.sent2: The company always aims to outdesign their competitors in product development.
meanings.sent3: The chef outdesigns the traditional recipe by adding a modern twist.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for outdesigning expectations amazes her clients.
meanings.sent5: The team's dedication to outdesigns the market sets them apart from others.
